column5: Got out this morning for some early smallmouth action.  6:30 until 10 am.  Got a bunch of fish but only a handful worth talking about.  Here are some pics.
If you dont mind me asking what is the general area you are fishing for them, around the 9th line of oro?
Im getting desperate for some bass, haven't caught any this summer (all catch and release).
Hey Simcoe FM. I got ya covered in that area.LOL No worry Cudz. Yer white flys are safe with me.LOL Nice fish btw.
Nice fish! Looks like a nice calm morning. Thanks for sharing.
Early morning is the time of day to get them now, before the boat traffic gets heavy!!!  Nice Smallies!!!
lol.  yeah if you know the area at all it is a no brainer.  Were you out this morning?  There was someone else fishing around there as well.  Wasn't sure if it was anyone from this board though.
Was not I,but you can bet I,ll be out there come Monday AM,looking for some of the same action.
Something I've noticed is that Simcoe smallies don't really have much color and stripes, maybe its due to Simcoe's colder and clearer waters.
From the pics they look normal to me, but if not I believe it's because they are moving a lot (not holding in one area).
